title: Hope Stands - Ten Reasons Why You Must Not Give Up
description: You are never without hope so long as one person is standing up for you. Before we give up on life, we need to know about the One who has given up on death. To the person who demands, Just give me one good reason to go on, this book presents you with ten. Hope Stands is about discovering solid hope that will never leave. Hope is as tangible as a man standing up before your eyes, in whatever situation you find yourself. Find the courage to Live, because Hope always Stands. Samuel Kee presents a clear and compelling call for life, as well as a biblical foundation for hope.
author: Samuel Kee
